appDesc.message: Make better Wattpad interface on desktop (just somes tricks, but incredibly convenient). Fully configurable
appDesc.description: Make better Wattpad interface on desktop (just somes tricks, but incredibly convenient). Fully configurable

optionsEnableBigComment.message: Auto-resize comment (discussion, MP) fields on user text.

optionsEnableLinks.message: Do links clickables and display links to pictures as pictures on fiction page

optionsEnableAlinea.message: Set text indentation on all paragraphe begins:

optionsEnableLocalStorageGestion.message: Enable comments and notifications reload button
